item.title: Reported threat halts flights at Washington's Reagan airport for a time
item.description: The Federal Aviation Authority says it halted all flights at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport for a time Tuesday because of a security threat

item.title: Atlanta Hawks ex-executive accused of stealing millions from team for personal expenses
item.description: Federal prosecutors are accusing a former Atlanta Hawks finance executive of stealing millions from the NBA team

item.title: US sanctions North Korean bankers accused of laundering stolen cryptocurrency
item.description: The United States is sanctioning a group of bankers and financial firms accused of laundering money for North Korea
